title: Infrastructure Provider
description:
The servers behind this CTF all run in the cloud on a single infrastructure provider. Can you determine which provider that is?

Note: Answer should be wrapped in the usual `CTF{x}`, but instead be all lowercase. Only accepted characters are `a-z`, numbers `0-9` and space ` `. E.g. if you think the answer is 'Facebook Inc', the corresponding answer would be `CTF{facebook}`.
